label: 皇后
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: A title awarded to a consort of a reigning emperor (or, occasionally, to some other female member of the royal family). It was ordinarily retained until the lady acquired another title, such as grand empress (kōtaigō) or an in name. See Chūgū. [皇太后　中宮]
